description:
A free and open source manga reader to read manga from a Tachidesk-Server instance.
Tachidesk-JUI can run Tachidesk-Server on its own on desktop platforms, or connect to an already hosted server.

Android and any desktop platform that runs Java can run it.
On most platforms are binaries available if you don't want to install Java yourself.
summary: A Tachidesk Client built in Compose Multiplatform
author: Suwayomi
